title: CMU TalentHub
description: Talent management and recruitment platform for Central Michigan University. Connects students with opportunities, employers with talent, and provides a streamlined experience for job matching and professional development.

title: AttendIQ
description: Smart attendance and engagement platform for organizations. Features mobile and web applications for check-in, scheduling, and real-time attendance tracking with a modern, user-friendly experience.

mobile.description: Mobile app for quick check-in, notifications, and on-the-go attendance management.

web.description: Web dashboard for administrators to manage attendance, view reports, and configure settings.

title: Alatoul
description: Comprehensive platform featuring mapping, location services, and dashboard analytics. Delivers a clean, intuitive web experience for managing and visualizing geographic and operational data.

title: Corners
description: Explore Africa like never before. Platform showcasing African heritage, travel, and culture with immersive content, destination guides, and community-driven experiences.

title: Water Docking Platform
description: Analytics and management platform for water docking operations. Provides real-time dashboards, reporting, and operational insights for maritime and docking facilities.

title: Multi-Currency Remittance System
description: A secure mobile application allowing users to send, request, convert, and pay money in multiple currencies. Integrated Stellar blockchain for secure and swift P2P transfers, bill payments, and financial management with real-time transaction tracking.

title: Payrite Payroll System
description: Comprehensive payroll management system for businesses to handle employee payments, tax calculations, and financial reporting with automated processing and compliance features.

title: Medical Reporting & Shift Scheduling Platform
description: Comprehensive system for UK care agencies to manage medication administration records and staff scheduling. Features real-time medication tracking, patient information management, and Medication Administration Record (MAR) charts.

mobile.description: Mobile application for caregivers to record medication administration, view patient information, and manage daily tasks on-the-go.

web.description: Web dashboard for administrators to manage staff schedules, patient records, and generate comprehensive reports.

title: Rota and Leave Management System
description: Full-featured scheduling platform for caregivers with separate web application for administrators and mobile application for caregivers. Includes scheduling calendar, shift management, and comprehensive system reports.

mobile.description: Mobile app for caregivers to view schedules, request leave, and manage their work assignments.

web.description: Web platform for administrators to create schedules, approve leave requests, and generate reports.

title: Local Remittance System
description: Secure, user-friendly money transfer system facilitating seamless transfers within specific regions or countries. Features multi-wallet support, real-time balance updates, transaction history management, and comprehensive financial tracking.

title: Blue Spotlight UK
description: Dynamic and responsive website dedicated to promoting artists, music events, and entertainment content across the UK. Platform showcases rising talent, music releases, exclusive interviews, and event highlights in a mobile-friendly format.

title: Fleet Management System
description: Comprehensive fleet management solution for taxi and commuter bus companies. Provides real-time vehicle tracking, driver management, route optimization, and operational analytics for transportation businesses.

title: CMU Slate Student Orientation
description: Interactive orientation platform for Central Michigan University students. Provides campus information, course registration guidance, and student resource management.

title: CMU Off-Campus Accommodation
description: Platform helping CMU students find off-campus housing options. Features property listings, roommate matching, and accommodation reviews.

title: CMU Student Perks
description: Platform providing CMU students access to free software, services, and resources worth thousands of dollars. Centralized hub for student benefits, academic tools, and campus resources in one convenient location.
